body_html: We are unlikely going to change this behavior. Changing this (compiling a cross-product of kernels for several types) will give us many more practical issues, like very large binary sizes, and code explosion.
body_text: We are unlikely going to change this behavior. Changing this (compiling a cross-product of kernels for several types) will give us many more practical issues, like very large binary sizes, and code explosion.
body: We are unlikely going to change this behavior. Changing this (compiling a cross-product of kernels for several types) will give us many more practical issues, like very large binary sizes, and code explosion.
